text: Up on the Roof may refer to: * "Up on the Roof" (song), a song written by Gerry Goffin and Carole King, notably recorded by The Drifters and James Taylor * Up on the Roof (musical), a musical play, and the film adaptation * Up on the Roof (TV series), a British children's programme * "Up on the Roof", a song by The Les Claypool Frog Brigade from Purple Onion * "Up on the Roof", a story in the Bone comics series, included in the collection The Great Cow Race
title: Up on the Roof
